item.title: Video Touchup for social media - Upwork
item.description:
My company posts a lot of videos to social media. Sometimes there are small things we'd like to clean up, fix or tweak in these videos. This could be anything from airbrushing a patch of dirt to removing something from the background. We also occasionally have more involved editing projects to make more complicated posts. I'm looking for someone to do this work for us hourly on an as-needed basis.

Hourly Range: $4.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 19:10 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Motion Graphic Video Creator for Short Promotional Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled motion graphic video creator to produce 5-10 second videos featuring animated text and minimal motion elements. These videos will highlight the benefits of our products focused on grounding and improving sleep quality.

We require 5 videos every second week as we constantly need new content. Ideal candidates will have experience in creating engaging, high-quality short videos for social media and ads. We are interested in establishing a long-term relationship for ongoing projects. Please see example video.

Budget: $100

Category: Motion Graphics

item.title: Amazon Seller Central and Optimization Expert, Loom or Screen Recording for Documenting Process - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a candidate with extensivd hands on experience working with Amazon Seller Central. FBA, Amazon Advertising, Enhanced Brand Content, Amazon Support Cases, and optimization tools such as helium10. Junglescout, etc.
What I want to do is build out a portfolio of video recordings via loom or screen recordings. These would be short videos, only a few minutes max per each. No voice over required, I can do that later. Each video would cover a specific topic related to Amazon, such as "How to Create a Product Title" or "How to Edit and optimize a Product title" to more complex topics like "how to work with amazon support to remove a policy violation" or "how to navigate pesticide issues" or "working with support on brand health issues".  The right candidate should already have experience doing these tasks, and they can record their screen as they would complete such tasks. Then the candidate would upload the video files to my server with a well labeled naming convention on folders, and upload a word document that clearly writes out all the steps taken in each video to complete the tasks..

This is a long term project, as my goal is to compile hundreds of such videos that I can then post to my company's YouTube channel after I do some light video edits to get my branding in there.
I may also use these to create an "Amazon Course" at some point

The candidate should be someone that is well organized, since we will need to keep track of videos created so we don't duplicate work. Additionally, the documentation need sto be well written so that I can properly write out great video descriptions for YouTube SEO


Hourly Range: $4.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 18:53 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Amazon, Amazon Seller Central, Amazon FBA, Loom, Screen Recording, Video Editing, Documentation
Skills: Amazon, Amazon Seller Central, Amazon FBA, Loom, Screen Recording, Video Editing, Documentation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Content Creator for Security Software Provider - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video content creator for a long term project with a security software provider. As a video content creator, you will be responsible for producing informative and marketing video content that aligns with our brand and objectives. This includes creating engaging scripts, storyboarding, shooting and editing high-quality videos, and adding visual effects and motion graphics when necessary.

  **Skills Required:**
  - Video editing software (e.g. Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Motion graphics software (e.g. Adobe After Effects)
  - Scriptwriting and storyboarding
  - Cinematography and lighting techniques
  - Sound recording and editing
  - Video SEO optimization

  This is a **large** project that requires a commitment of **more than 6 months**. We are looking for an **expert** in video content creation who can deliver high-quality videos that effectively communicate our brand's message. If you are passionate about creating engaging video content and have a strong understanding of the security software industry, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $60.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 18:53 UTC
Category: Creative Writing
Skills:Graphic Design, Content Writing, Web Development, Video Editing
Skills: Graphic Design, Content Writing, Web Development, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Video Editor - MMA Niche - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there! We are a YouTube Automation company and we are looking for a talented, hardworking, and experienced video editor to join our team.

•••MUST BE ABLE TO WORK QUICKLY•••

•••MUST UNDERSTAND COPYRIGHT LAWS•••

•••LATE/COPYRIGHT ISSUES = DEDUCTIONS•••

We are looking for MULTIPLE people experienced in editing videos for:

The MMA News/Information Niche, similar to these channels:

https://youtube.com/@mmaonpoint?si=mJvX3Ux0Smuqr0Kc

https://youtube.com/@themmazone?si=o7ZyvvN_l3MmzRn6

We are looking for a long-term collaboration, on a project basis in the beginning, and eventually, if we are a good fit we would also have the full-time/retainer opportunity.

Please do not apply if you do not have any experience.

Looking forward to working with you!
Mike


Budget: $30

item.title: Experienced Editor Needed for Tiktok Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor to help us create engaging nature-focused content for TikTok around our upcoming book launch Wild Life.

The inspiration for what we are looking for is like this (https://www.tiktok.com/@hungrymindsart/video/7364151112213073195) or this (https://www.tiktok.com/@hungrymindsart).

These videos should be visually appealing, engaging, and tailored to the TikTok audience. Use creative editing techniques, transitions, and effects to enhance the content's appeal.

Some ideas could look like:
Something like this https://youtube.com/shorts/Tn1YQOO1cEU?si=Y3eSuqOZKqObfv8Q with the countdown, and then cut to the book dropping in and Cara saying… You know, Hippos can't actually swim, they just run on the bottom! On the other hand they ooze something called “Blood Sweat” so you know… find out more in Atlas Obscura’s WILD LIFE…

(Or this https://www.tiktok.com/@thekiidkey/video/7333396840420756778 1 2 and on three we drop the book in. “The Peregrine Falcon is the fastest diving bird in the world. And if you are in a big city they probably live pretty close to you! Find out more in Atlas Obscura’s WILD LIFE, our guide to the World’s Living Wonders


Please give me a project range and share examples of your best ads work.


Posted On: June 20, 2024 18:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Quick Clips - Upwork
item.description:
Stephen...
There are  2 objectives with this next job. The first objective is to create an animation with our logo to open and close all the videos we will be making moving forward. I’m not looking for anything too flashy. In the link below, I like the intro that our previous editor created. Check it out:  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y43LttiCNZQ&t=21s
Perhaps provide us with a few examples for the open and close of a video to choose from.

The second object is to polish the 2 “Get a Quote” videos. Mostly…add some music, intros and overlay the venue images when the girls name the locations: “All the Walter’s Estate Locations” ect… (The filenames tell you the venue name.) One of the videos is greenscreen and needs to be keyed to white. (Possibly we may want a studio in the background. I’ll make that decision after I see the white.)

I’m still waiting on the second video, but if you want to get going on the video you already have…go for it. Here is the folder containing the venue images: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1zkEZTgPtHFYk6klfK2PHDmZYOeZi_qjG?usp=sharing


Posted On: June 20, 2024 18:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for NBA Prospect Product Highlight Videos - Upwork
item.description:
My company is called Groov. You can check out www.Groov.me to learn more and see some of our existing digital assets. In a nutshell, Groov offers a footwear personalization system. This system is built around an iphone app that enables point-and-click 3D scans to be taken of both feet and shoes, which drives the production of high-quality shoe inserts that are fully-custom and algorithmically-optimized to maximize comfort, support, and performance for any person in any shoe.

We are preparing to launch and developing video content to share on social media to support our marketing efforts. We had the privilege of setting up several of the top prospects in this upcoming NBA draft with our product. We filmed the session where we initially scanned their feet and shoes, and then we filmed the session where we handed off the product and watched them try it out. They response was extremely positive and we want to put together some videos using the footage we captured.

We are seeking a skilled video editor to help us create high-quality highlight videos of NBA prospects using and reacting to our product. The editor will be responsible for taking raw video footage and transforming it into visually appealing and engaging highlight videos. The editor will also be responsible for editing the audio to boost dialogue clarity and minimize the sound of basketballs being dribbled. The ideal candidate will have experience in video editing, a good eye for storytelling through visuals, and a solid understanding of the NBA. Attention to detail and the ability to work with tight deadlines are essential.

We have about 30 minutes of footage and are hoping to produce 5 highlight videos. One should be about a minute long and summarize the whole engagement. Another should be about 20 seconds long and highlight the successful response. The other three should also be short, and will be focused on specific interactions that were captured in the footage, that I can specify once the project is accepted.

I'm hoping to have these completed by the end of this weekend and can pay up to $500 for the job. Preference will be given to those with demonstrated high-quality outputs and the ability to turn this around on a tight timeline.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Visual storytelling
- Attention to detail
- NBA knowledge

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 20, 2024 18:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Video Editing, Social Media Video, Video Production
Skills: Audio Editing, Video Editing, Social Media Video, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply
